name: swiper

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=development gulp server
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[35m\u001b[1mLove Swiper? Support Vladimir\'s work by donating or pledging on patreon:\u001b[22m\u001b[39m\n > \u001b[32mhttps://patreon.com/vladimirkharlampidi\u001b[0m\n')"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp playground && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp server
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build:dev
